ModMetaData.name: ThermalUnits - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: the_codewarrior
ModMetaData.description: Display multiple temperature units (This is the dev version of ThermalUnits. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
